params.name: sourceStruct
params.description: Structure that contains the data to append to destStruct

params.name: overwriteFlag
params.description:
Whether values in sourceStruct should overwrite corresponding values in
 destStruct or not.

coldfusion.notes: CF6+ can be used on XML objects as well as structures.

links.title: Learning Built-In Functions And Member-Methods by Ben Nadel

examples.title: Append options to config struct (without overwrite flag)
Append options to config struct (same, but using member function)
Append options to config struct (with overwrite flag)
Creating a request context from form and url scopes
examples.description: Demonstrates how to construct a Request Context (rc) that combines the values of the form and url scopes

examples.title: Polyfill for earlier versions
examples.description: In older ColdFusion version where this function is not supported yet, you can fall back to a native java method to achieve the same behavior except that it does not have the `overwriteFlag`.
